sentences.en: ...gorgeous mountain scenery.
sentences.cn: …壮观的山间景色。

sentences.en: ‘What do you think of my new flatmate?’ ‘He’s absolutely gorgeous !’
sentences.cn: “你觉得我的新室友怎么样？”“他帅极了！”

sentences.en: "Hey, you're gorgeous," he slurred.
sentences.cn: “嗨，你真漂亮，”他含混地说。

sentences.en: "Isn't it a gorgeous day, Father?"— 'Yes. indeed!'
sentences.cn: “爸爸，今天天气是不是很棒？”——“是的，确实很棒！”

sentences.en: a drop-dead gorgeous Hollywood star
sentences.cn: 极有魅力的好莱坞明星

sentences.en: a gorgeous cake
sentences.cn: 漂亮的蛋糕

sentences.en: All the girls in my house are mad about Ryan, they think he's gorgeous.
sentences.cn: 跟我同住的女孩都对瑞安很痴迷，她们觉得他非常性感。

sentences.en: exotic birds with feathers of gorgeous colours
sentences.cn: 长着绚丽羽毛的异国的鸟

sentences.en: He is perfectly gorgeous as Romeo.
sentences.cn: 他演罗密欧演得真好.

sentences.en: I never saw such a gorgeous mink coat in all my life.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子也没见过这样华丽的貂皮大衣.

sentences.en: It's a gorgeous day.
sentences.cn: 这天过得很愉快。

sentences.en: Male models used to be gorgeous — all chiselled jaw, perfect pecs and golden tan.
sentences.cn: 以前男模是很帅的——都有着棱角分明的下巴、完美的胸肌和金棕色的皮肤。

sentences.en: She has a reputation for brilliance. Also, she is gorgeous.
sentences.cn: 她以才华出众而闻名。此外，她还非常漂亮。

sentences.en: She said that Campbell-Black was drop-dead gorgeous.
sentences.cn: 她说坎贝尔·布莱克简直帅呆了。

sentences.en: Some of the Renaissance buildings are gorgeous.
sentences.cn: 一些文艺复兴时期的建筑美得令人惊叹。

sentences.en: The cosmetics industry uses gorgeous women to sell its skincare products.
sentences.cn: 化妆品行业常找一些性感美女来推销护肤产品。

sentences.en: The gorgeous costume added to the brilliance of the dance.
sentences.cn: 华丽的服装使舞蹈更加光彩夺目.

sentences.en: The hotel room had a gorgeous view.
sentences.cn: 那间客房窗外景色迷人。

sentences.en: There were many gorgeous females busy browning themselves.
sentences.cn: 有许多漂亮的女性忙着晒黑自己。

sentences.en: What a gorgeous day it is today!
sentences.cn: 今天天气多好 啊 !

sentences.en: You look gorgeous, Maria.
sentences.cn: 你看上去非常漂亮，玛丽亚。

trans.tran_cn: 华丽的，艳丽的，极好的，称心的，美丽动人的，光彩夺目的，令人愉快的，令人享受的
